page.topic: UX Component - PhoneGap Applications - Setting Default Properties for the PhoneGap Genie
page.description: When you build a PhoneGap application it is critical that you turn on all of the required plug-ins for your application in the PhoneGap Build Project Settings genie.

section.description: A property in the UX Builder allows you to specify that certain PhoneGap settings should be automatically set when a PhoneGap application is built using a particular component.

When you click the smart field for the PhoneGap default settings property, a dialog is shown where you can set certain PhoneGap Builder properties. When you open the PhoneGap genie, the corresponding properties in the builder will automatically be set.
